name: Only Button (Masonzk)
description: A short game for the Black Thorn Prod Game Jam. With the theme being "Less is more", I wanted to see what I could do with less, even just a button. It was also made in 3 hours, so less time. Even this itch page is simple, but it gets the point across. The title too is short,  but can be read multiple different ways.
